Submit text content for evaluation.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"text":{"type":"string","title":"Text","description":"The text content to be evaluated."},"keywords":{"type":"array","title":"Keywords","description":"List of keywords to analyze within the text content.","items":{"type":"string"}}},"type":"object","required":["text"],"title":"ContentEvaluationRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["quality_score","metadata"],"properties":{"quality_score":{"type":"object","required":["overall","breakdown"],"properties":{"overall":{"type":"number","format":"float","description":"The overall quality score."},"breakdown":{"type":"object","required":["content","readability","seo"],"properties":{"content":{"type":"object","required":["purpose","accuracy","depth"],"properties":{"purpose":{"type":"integer"},"accuracy":{"type":"integer"},"depth":{"type":"integer"}}},"readability":{"type":"object","required":["score","grade_level","complex_sentences"],"properties":{"score":{"type":"number","format":"float"},"grade_level":{"type":"integer"},"complex_sentences":{"type":"object","required":["hard","very_hard","total"],"properties":{"hard":{"type":"integer"},"very_hard":{"type":"integer"},"total":{"type":"integer"}}}}},"seo":{"type":"object","required":["keyword_density","top_entities","score"],"properties":{"keyword_density":{"oneOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Object with keyword percentages when keywords are provided","additionalProperties":{"type":"number","format":"float"}},{"type":"null","description":"Null when no keywords are provided"}]},"top_entities":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["text","count"],"properties":{"text":{"type":"string"},"count":{"type":"integer"}}}}},"score":{"type":"integer"}}}}}}},"metadata":{"type":"object","required":["word_count","sentiment","performance","eval_id"],"properties":{"word_count":{"type":"integer"},"sentiment":{"type":"object","required":["polarity","subjectivity"],"properties":{"polarity":{"type":"number","format":"float"},"subjectivity":{"type":"number","format":"float"}}},"performance":{"type":"object","required":["automated_metrics","keyword_analysis","llm_evaluation","combine_metrics","quality_score"],"properties":{"automated_metrics":{"type":"number","format":"float"},"keyword_analysis":{"type":"number","format":"float"},"llm_evaluation":{"type":"number","format":"float"},"combine_metrics":{"type":"integer"},"quality_score":{"type":"integer"}}},"eval_id":{"type":"string"}}}},"title":"ContentEvaluationResponse"}}}},"422":{"description":"Validation Error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"detail":{"items":{"properties":{"loc":{"items":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"integer"}]},"type":"array","title":"Location"},"msg":{"type":"string","title":"Message"},"type":{"type":"string","title":"Error Type"}},"type":"object","required":["loc","msg","type"],"title":"ValidationError"},"type":"array","title":"Detail"}},"type":"object","title":"HTTPValidationError"}}}}}}
>
